member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.GcPdf.InputFieldManager.AddInputToPage(System.Int32,System.Drawing.RectangleF,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Rendering.Components.IInputField)

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.GcPdf.InputFieldManager.IsNumeric(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the specified value is numeric
member.remarks: This is different from VB IsNumeric, as we are not trying to convert and byte, sbyte and boolean are not considered to be numeric

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.GcPdf.InputFieldManager.IsDate(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the specified value data type is date/time

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.GcPdf.InputFieldManager.TransformRectangle(System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Scale and shift the rectangle according to the matrix transformation object
member.remarks: The resulting rectangle will not rotate, it will just resize and shift. This means that this method does not support non-90 degree rotations.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.MetadataKeywordsExtensions.ParseKeywords(System.String)
member.summary: Splits a string of keywords into an array of keywords that can be stored in PDF metadata in the "dc:subject" property.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.NeverEmbedFontsExtensions.NormalizeFontName(System.String,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Drawing.Core.IFontsFactory)
member.summary: Gets english normalized font name
member.remarks: Windows allows multiply font names: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/michkap/archive/2005/02/26/380867.aspx we should reproduce this mapping here, because user can use local names instead of international and font fallback will fails.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.RenderingInfo
member.summary: Rendering related settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.RenderingInfo.Version
member.summary: Sets output PDF version.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.RenderingInfo.EmbedFonts
member.summary: Embeds fonts or not.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.RenderingInfo.NeverEmbedFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets not embedded fonts list (with ',' or ';' as separator).

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.RenderingInfo.PrintOnOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the document should be printed after open.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.RenderingInfo.OptimizeLargeDocument
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the document is really huge or not.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.RenderingInfo.Linearization
member.summary: Gets or sets linearization.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.Default
member.summary: The default permissions.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.None
member.summary: You can use this setting alone to specify that none of the other permissions are set. It has no effect if you bitwise or this flag together with the other flags.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.AllowPrint
member.summary: Set to permit printing the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.AllowModifyContents
member.summary: Set to permit modifying the document’s contents when it is opened with user access permission. Text annotations can still be added or modified. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.AllowCopy
member.summary: Set to permit copying text or graphics from the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.AllowModifyAnnotations
member.summary: Set to permit adding or modifying annotations in the document when it is opened with user access permission. This permission is a revision 2 or revision 3 permission. Under revision three, the ability to copy/paste document contents is restricted other than what is specified by bit 10 (AllowAccessibleReaders).

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.AllowFillIn
member.summary: Set to permit filling in form fields in the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.AllowAccessibleReaders
member.summary: Set to permit extracting the text and graphics of the document for accessibility purposes or otherwise (it is most likely for accessibility reasons, but possibly for other “screen reading” purposes) when it is opened with user access permission. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PdfPermissions.AllowAssembly
member.summary: Set to permit the following operations when the document is opened with user access permission:Insert, rotate, or delete pages, and create bookmarks or thumbnail images even if AllowModifyContents is false. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SecurityInfo
member.summary: Security info.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SecurityInfo.Encrypt
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the document is encrypted or not.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SecurityInfo.OwnerPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the owner password that can be entered in the reader that permits full access to the document regardless of the specified user permissions.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SecurityInfo.UserPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the user password that can be entered in the reader. If this value is left empty they user will not be prompted for a password, however the user will be restricted by the specified permissions.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SecurityInfo.Permissions
member.summary: Gets or sets the the user permissions for the document. The values can be combined using a bitwise OR combination.
member.remarks: By default all permissions are set/allowed.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.CertificationLevel
member.summary: Enumerates possible certification types

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.CertificationLevel.NotCertified
member.summary: Document is not certified

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.CertificationLevel.NoChangesAllowed
member.summary: Certified, but no changes permitted

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.CertificationLevel.FormFilling
member.summary: Certified, permit changes to form field and signing

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.CertificationLevel.FormFillingAnnotations
member.summary: Certified, permit changes to form field, annotation and signing

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.VisibilityType
member.summary: Possible visibility types for pdf signature

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.VisibilityType.Invisible
member.summary: Invisible signature, it means no data will be shown on page, but it will be accessible via "Signatures" tab in reader

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.VisibilityType.Text
member.summary: Show only text on signature

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.VisibilityType.Image
member.summary: Show only image on signature

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.VisibilityType.ImageText
member.summary: Show both, image and text

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.Alignment.Right
member.summary: Right

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.Alignment.Left
member.summary: Left

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.Alignment.Center
member.summary: Center

member.summary: Default ctor

member.summary: Gets/sets the bounds of the signature

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.PageIndex
member.summary: Gets/sets index of the page, where signature should be placed

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.Text
member.summary: Gets/sets signature text

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.Font
member.summary: gets/sets text font

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.TextColor
member.summary: Gets/sets text color

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.TextAlignment
member.summary: Gets/sets text alignment

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.TextRectangle
member.summary: Gets/sets area where text should be placed. By default entire signature area will be used.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.ImageAlignment
member.summary: Gets/sets image alignment inside signature

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.Image
member.summary: Gets/sets image shown on signature

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.ImageRectangle
member.summary: Gets/sets area where image should be placed. By default entire signature rectangle will be used.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SignatureStamp.VisibilityType
member.summary: Gets/sets stamp visibility type

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo
member.summary: Signing information.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.Stamp
member.summary: Gets stamp settings

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.Certificate
member.summary: Gets/sets the signing certificate

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.SignerName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the name of the person or authority signing the document.
NOTE: This value is used only if it is not possible to extract the name from the signature, for example from the certificate of the signer.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.SigningDateTime
member.summary:
Ges or sets the time of signing.
NOTE: This value is used only if the time of signing is not available in the signature. For example, a time stamp can be embedded in a PKCS#7 binary data object.
By default this property is initialized with the current date and time.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the CPU host name or physical location of the signing.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.Reason
member.summary: Gets or sets the reason for the signing, such as "I agree...".

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.ContactInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the information provided by the signer to enable a recipient to contact the signer to verify the signature (for example, a phone number).

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.TimeStamp
member.summary: Gets the settings for TSA server

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.SignatureCertificationLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets Certification level

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.SignatureFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the signature.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.Pkcs7SignatureFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the signature.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.SignatureDigestAlgorithm
member.summary: Gets or sets the signature digest algorithm.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.SigningInfo.HashAlgorithms
member.summary: Gets or sets the signature digest algorithm. By default GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.Security.OID.HashAlgorithms.SHA1.ID

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DisplayMode
member.summary: Used to specify settings.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DisplayMode.None
member.summary: Neither document outline nor thumbnail images are visible.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DisplayMode.Outlines
member.summary: The document outline is visible.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DisplayMode.Thumbs
member.summary: Thumbnail images are visible. If thumbnails and outline flags are set, thumbnails will be shown.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DisplayMode.FullScreen
member.summary: Full-screen mode with no menu bar, window controls, or any other window visible.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PageScaling
member.summary: Specifies the Page Scaling.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PageScaling.Default
member.summary: Uses the application default setting, which is Shrink To Printable Area.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.PageScaling.None
member.summary: Prevents automatic scaling to fit the printable area. Use this setting to preserve the scale in engineering documents or the point size required for legal reasons.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DuplexMode
member.summary: Specifies Printer duplex option. For best results, the selected printer should support duplex printing if you select a duplex option.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DuplexMode.Simplex
member.summary: Prints on one side of the paper.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DuplexMode.DuplexFlipLongEdge
member.summary: Prints on both sides of the paper; the paper flips along the long edge.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.DuplexMode.DuplexFlipShortEdge
member.summary: Prints on both sides of the paper; the paper flips along the short edge.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences
member.summary: Viewer related settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.HideToolbar
member.summary: True to hide the viewer application’s toolbars when the document is active. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.HideMenubar
member.summary: True to hide the viewer application’s menu bar when the document is active. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.HideWindowUI
member.summary: True to hide user interface elements in the document’s window (such as scroll bars and navigation controls), leaving only the document’s contents displayed. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.FitWindow
member.summary: True to resize the document’s window to fit the size of the first displayed page. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.CenterWindow
member.summary: True to position the document’s window in the center of the screen. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.DisplayTitle
member.summary: True if the window’s title bar should display the document title taken from the Title entry in the document information/metadata. If this value is false, the title bar should instead display the name of the PDF file containing the document. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.DisplayMode
member.summary: Specifies how the document should be displayed when opened.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.PageScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets the page scaling.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.DuplexMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the duplex mode.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.PaperSourceByPageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the paper source by page size flag.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.PrintPageRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the print page range.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Settings.ViewerPreferences.NumberOfCopies
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of copies.

member.summary: Implementation of tagged pdf canvas.
